text: Prosecutions under §§ 8-301 to 8-303 shall be in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia, upon information filed by the Corporation Counsel for said District or 1 of his assistants.
historical:

DC CODE § 8-303

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)
